## DOMViewSvc type

Full DOM service type - signals + view + use

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type DOMViewSvc = SignalsSvc &
  DOMViewSvc & {
    use: Use<SignalsSvc & DOMViewSvc>;
  };
```

**References:** [SignalsSvc](../../signals/signalssvc/)<!-- -->, [DOMViewSvc](../domviewsvc/)<!-- -->, [Use](../use/)

## Example

```typescript
import { createDOMView, type DOMViewSvc } from '@lattice/view/presets/dom';

const svc: DOMViewSvc = createDOMView();
const { signal, computed, el, map, match, on, mount } = svc;
```
